p: Statistical tests were performed using SPSS 24 (IBM Corp., Armonk, NY, USA). DR prevalence was determined with a confidence interval (CI) of 95% using the Wilson method. Categorical variables were compared using 2-tailed Fisherâ€™s exact test, while continuous variables were compared using Mann-Whitney 2-tailed U test. Trends over time were analysed using linear-by-linear test for association.
